english: The two boats sank together into the sea .
chinese: 这两条船同时下沉入海。

english: During the journey, their boat began to sink .
chinese: 途中他们的小船开始下沉。

english: When the boat sank they had to swim for it ..
chinese: 小船下沉的时候，他们不得不游水逃生。

english: These fine particles also settle according to stoke's law .
chinese: 这些细泥沙按斯托克斯定律下沉。

english: Two or three red farm-houses dozed under the apple-trees .
chinese: 两三栋红色的农舍在苹果树林下沉睡。
下沉造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: How black was his despair when he felt himself sinking again .
chinese: 而当他再度下沉时，更觉水里暗淡凄凉！

english: The descent warms the air and its relative humidity accordingly drops .
chinese: 这种下沉使空气变暖，其相对温度相应下降。

english: There has been an intermittent uplift of the land and subsidence of the sea going on .
chinese: 陆地上升和海洋下沉一直在间歇地发生。

english: There has been an intermittent uplift of the land and subsidence of the sea going on .
chinese: 陆地上升和海洋下沉一直在间歇地进行。

english: After a given length of time the buoy sinks itself and is not recovered .
chinese: 经过给定的时间之后，浮标自身下沉，并且不再恢复原状。

english: Whenever she mentioned her mother, it gave a pang to the heart of poor eliner .
chinese: 每当她提到母亲，可怜的埃丽诺便觉得心脏猛然下沉。

english: The captain refused to leave his sinking ship while there  were others on board .
chinese: 在船上还有其他人的时候，船长不肯离开正在下沉的船。

english: Did equilibration take place before or after setting of chromite and silicates ?
chinese: 究竟平衡作用发生在铬铁矿和硅酸盐下沉之前，还是在其后？
